mapper.sql: IP, PORT, SID, SERVICENAME, SCHEMA, USERNAME, PASSWORD, JGXTLB, AZDM, AGENTYPE, SYLJAS, ID, ZLNUM, CLNUM, STARTEPOCH
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ADTMGR.DBCONPRO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ADTMGR.DBCONPRO (IP, PORT, SID, SERVICENAME, SCHEMA, USERNAME, PASSWORD, JGXTLB, AZDM, AGENTYPE, SYLJAS, ID, ZLNUM, CLNUM, STARTEPOCH ) values (#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jgxtlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{azdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{syljas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zlnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startepoch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update ADTMGR.DBCONPRO
IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT = #{record.port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SID = #{record.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICENAME = #{record.servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEMA = #{record.schema,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JGXTLB = #{record.jgxtlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AZDM = #{record.azdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENTYPE = #{record.agentype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYLJAS = #{record.syljas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZLNUM = #{record.zlnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLNUM = #{record.clnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STARTEPOCH = #{record.startepoch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update ADTMGR.DBCONPRO set IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{record.port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SID = #{record.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICENAME = #{record.servicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEMA = #{record.schema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGXTLB = #{record.jgxtlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AZDM = #{record.azdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENTYPE = #{record.agentype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYLJAS = #{record.syljas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZLNUM = #{record.zlnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLNUM = #{record.clnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTEPOCH = #{record.startepoch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM nums,u.* FROM ADTMGR.DBCONPRO u) WHERE nums >= #{before} AND nums <= #{after}

select count(*) FROM ADTMGR.DBCONPRO where 1=1
AND jgxtlb like '%'||#{param1}||'%'
AND ip like '%'||#{param2}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into dbconpro (ip, port, sid, servicename, schema, username, password, jgxtlb, azdm, agentype, syljas, zlnum, clnum,startepoch) values (#{ip}, #{port}, #{sid}, #{servicename}, #{schema}, #{username}, #{password}, #{jgxtlb}, #{azdm}, #{agentype}, #{syljas}, #{zlnum}, #{clnum} ,#{startepoch})
mapper.update: update dbconpro set ip = #{ip}, port = #{port}, sid = #{sid}, servicename = #{servicename}, schema = #{schema}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, jgxtlb = #{jgxtlb}, azdm = #{azdm}, agentype = #{agentype}, syljas = #{syljas}, zlnum = #{zlnum}, clnum = #{clnum}, startepoch = #{startepoch} where id = #{id}
